Posts.Content: Hi Mandz1001, enjoy your cruise side effects are different for each and everyone of us....  take them as they come and pray they will mild xx
Posts.Title: **** July Breast Cancer Chemo Club ****

Posts.Content: Hi there,  i have recently finished 20 sessions of radiotherapy, only had problems one day with not being lined up.... my own stupid fault.  I scratched my head on the bed when they were walking out...  were back a few minutes later to recline.... i was always taken on time with no problems....  12 minutes from start to finish unless I chatted more than usual frances.
Posts.Title: Not 'lined up' No RT today - anyone else have this?
